Uses of Interface
org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common.AMLoginModuleBinder

  • Packages that use AMLoginModuleBinder 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.amster  
    org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common
    This package contains classes that are common for use by all authentication modules.
    org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.persistentcookie
    This package contains classes Authentication using a Persistent Cookie.

    • Uses of AMLoginModuleBinder in org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.amster

      Classes in org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.amster that implement AMLoginModuleBinder 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Amster
      The Amster auth module - delegates to AmsterAuthLoginModule via the AbstractLoginModuleBinder.

    • Uses of AMLoginModuleBinder in org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common

      Classes in org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common that implement AMLoginModuleBinder 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractLoginModuleBinder
      Implementation of the AMLoginModuleBinder, as per described in the interface's JavaDoc, also extends the AMLoginModule, with a constructor which takes an instance of a AuthLoginModule which the calls from the AMLoginModule will be pass through too.
      Methods in org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common with parameters of type AMLoginModuleBinder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void AuthLoginModule.setAMLoginModule​(AMLoginModuleBinder amLoginModuleBinder)
      Constructs an instance of the AuthLoginModule.

    • Uses of AMLoginModuleBinder in org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.persistentcookie

      Classes in org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.persistentcookie that implement AMLoginModuleBinder 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  PersistentCookie
      Sub type of the AbstractLoginModuleBinder which binds the AMLoginModule with the PersistentCookieAuthModule authentication logic.
